Name: Dantes in Fernet
Ingredients: 30 ml Speyside single malt Scotch whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: It's obvious that this Blood & Sand -like cocktail contains Fernet, it has an almost smoky herbal influence. Maple syrup is an inspired sweetener and flavour enhancer.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in September 2013 by Mickaël Lenu, a Frenchman while working at Ancestral bar in Wellington, New Zealand.
Nutrition: One serving of Dantes in Fernet contains 130 calories
